author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Lakshmi Precision Screws' board meeting rescheduled
description: THE 306th BOARD MEETING OF THE COMPANY IS RESCHEDULED ON TUESDAY, 12TH DAY OF SEPTEMBER, 2017 DUE TO NON- FINALIZATION OF FINANCIAL STATEMENT FOR FIRST QUARTER ENDED ON JUNE 30, 2017 FOR FINANCIAL YEAR 2017-18.
articleBody: THE 306th BOARD MEETING OF THE COMPANY IS RESCHEDULED ON TUESDAY, 12TH DAY OF SEPTEMBER, 2017 DUE TO NON- FINALIZATION OF FINANCIAL STATEMENT FOR FIRST QUARTER ENDED ON JUNE 30, 2017 FOR FINANCIAL YEAR 2017-18.  TRADING WINDOW SHALL BE CLOSED FROM SEPTEMBER 05, 2017 TO SEPTEMBER 14, 2017.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Lakshmi Precision Screws' board meeting on August 11, 2017
description: The Meeting of Board of Directors is scheduled on Friday, the 11th day of August, 2017 at Rohtak, to inter alia, to consider, approve and take on record the un-audited financial Results for quarter 1 ended on June 30, 2017.
articleBody: The Meeting of Board of Directors is scheduled on Friday, the 11th day of August, 2017 at Rohtak, to inter alia, to consider, approve and take on record the un-audited financial Results for quarter 1 ended on June 30, 2017.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Lakshmi Precision Screws to consider dividend
description: Lakshmi Precision Screws Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on June 20, 2017, to, consider, approve and take on record Annual Audited Financial Results for the fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31, 2017 and to recommend the dividend, if any.
articleBody: Lakshmi Precision Screws Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on June 20, 2017, to, inter alia, to consider, approve and take on record Annual Audited Financial Results for the fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31, 2017 and to recommend the dividend, if any, subject to the approval of the members in the ensuing 48th Annual General Meeting.Further, the Trading Window, under the provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 will remain closed from June 13, 2017 to June 22, 2017 (both days inclusive).Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Lakshmi Precision Screws' board meeting on June 20, 2017
description: Intimation of Convening Board Meeting on June 20, 2017 interalia to consider and approve Audited financial results for fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31, 2017.
articleBody: Intimation of Convening Board Meeting on June 20, 2017 interalia to consider and approve Audited financial results for fourth quarter and financial year ended on March 31, 2017.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Lakshmi Precision Screws' board meeting on May 30, 2017
description: Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, this is to inform that the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday, May 30, 2017, to, iteralia, to consider and approve Audited Financial results for fourth quarter and Annual Financial Result for FY 2016-17, and to recommend the dividend, if any.
articleBody: Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, this is to inform that the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday, May 30, 2017, to, iteralia, to consider and approve Audited Financial results for fourth quarter and Annual Financial Result for FY 2016-17, and to recommend the dividend, if any, subject to approval of the members in ensuing the 48th Annual General Meeting.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Lakshmi Precision Screws: Updates on resignation of director
description: Lakshmi Precision Screws has informed that in partial modification of earlier intimation of Resignation of Director, as communicated vide letter dated July 08, 2016, the Company had received the intimation from Mr. Bhuwan Kumar Chaturvedi, Independent Director, via email on August 02, 2016.
articleBody: Lakshmi Precision Screws Ltd has informed BSE that in partial modification of earlier intimation of Resignation of Director, as communicated vide letter dated July 08, 2016, the Company had received the intimation from Mr. Bhuwan Kumar Chaturvedi, Independent Director, via email on August 02, 2016, where he had mentioned his resignation date should be read as August 16, 2016 instead of July 05, 2016.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Lakshmi Prec
